ygData.msgSnippet: the whole STREAM of emails bothered me .. starting with your obnoxious email to rebecca, Nick!  To the extent that I am goin g to onelist right now to cancel
ygData.messageBody:
the whole STREAM of emails bothered me .. starting
with your obnoxious email to rebecca, Nick! To the
extent that I am goin g to onelist right now to cancel
my subscription... with any luck everyone else will
do the same thing and then you will have NO emails to
worry about.. or better still NICK OFF YOURSELF!!


I am just disgusted !!!

===
Caza

~~The person who knows how to laugh at himself
will never cease to be amused~~
